SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.SimpleShapes
Class Polymarker

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Node
      SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.SimpleShapes.SimpleShape
          SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.SimpleShapes.Polymarker
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGL_Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PixelPolymarker
public class Polymarker
extends SimpleShape

This Node draws colored markers of a specified type and size at the specified points.

Polymarker

                  java.awt.Color new_color)

Parameters:
new_color - The color of the parallelogram.
Method Detail

setSize

public void setSize(int size)
Set the size of the markers to be drawn. The sizes are specified in terms of the number of pixels to move on each side of the pixel at which the marker is placed. This affects all of the marker types, except the DOT marker. A DOT marker is always just one pixel.

Parameters:
size - Adjust the size of the marker. The actual size in pixels is 2*size + 1, since this parameter specifies the distance to draw from the center position.

setType

public void setType(int type)
Specify the type of marker to be placed at each point of this polymarker.

Parameters:
type - Type code for the marker to use. This should be one of the defined marker types such as DOT, PLUS, STAR, etc.

Render

public void Render(net.java.games.jogl.GLDrawable drawable)
Render this Polymarker to the specified drawable.

Parameters:
drawable - The drawable on which the Parallelogram is to be drawn.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main program that constructs an instance of Parallelogram and displays it in 3D for testing purposes.
